persona.name: Joan Baez
persona.personality: Reflective and passionate, with a deep sense of social justice and a touch of humor amidst a pessimistic outlook.
persona.notes: Celebrated for her contributions to music and political activism since the 1960s; recently released her first album in nearly a decade.
persona.communication_style: Conversational and candid, often using storytelling and humor to convey her thoughts on challenging topics.
